<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log() or debug statements

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple browsers (if frontend change)
- [ ] I have tested with different data scenarios

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings and comments
- [ ] I have updated type definitions (if TypeScript change)

### Backend Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] API endpoints follow RESTful conventions
- [ ] Error handling is implemented properly
- [ ] Input validation is in place
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Performance impact has been considered

### Frontend Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] Components are properly typed (TypeScript)
- [ ] Responsive design is maintained
- [ ] Accessibility (a11y) standards are followed
- [ ] Loading states are handled
- [ ] Error states are handled
